p: The relaxant effect of aqueous extract of F. assa-foetida (2, 5, and 10â€‰mg/ml) on the smooth muscle of the guinea pig tracheal chain ( in vitro study) was reported [ 95]. The relaxant effect of F. assa-foetida extract via inhibitory effect on histamine (H1) receptors, muscarinic receptors, and possible mechanisms for functional antagonistic on tracheal smooth muscle) have been investigated and [ 96, 97] also reviewed [ 98].
